column2: Kikuchi-shi) is a city located in Kumamoto Prefecture on the island of Kyushu
column3: Japan. The city was founded on August 1
the city has an estimated population of 49
column4: 455 and a population density of 180 persons per km2. The total area is 276.66 km2 (106.82 sq mi).

column3: Kikuchi absorbed the towns of Shichijo and Shisui
column4: and the village of Kyokushi (all from Kikuchi District) to create the new and expanded city of Kikuchi.
